parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Filter to apply, allowed fields are:  
- (String) email  
- (String) given_name  
- (String) family_name  
- (String) company_id  
- (Set[String]) contact_ids  
- (String) start_update_time  
- (String) end_update_time

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description:
Attribute and direction to order items.  
One of the following fields:  
- id  
- date_created  
- email  
One of the following directions:  
- asc  
- desc

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Total number of items to return per page

post.description:
Creates a new contact as the authenticated user.  
*Note:* Contact must contain at least one item in `email_addresses` or `phone_numbers` and `country_code` is required if `region` is specified.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of Contact properties to include in the response. (Available fields are: `score_value`, `addresses`, `anniversary`, `birthday`, `company`, `contact_type`, `custom_fields`, `create_time`, `email_addresses`, `fax_numbers`, `job_title`, `update_date`, `leadsource_id`,`middle_name`, `origin`, `owner_id`, `phone_numbers`, `preferred_locale`, `preferred_name`,`prefix`, `relationships`, `social_accounts`, `source_type`, `spouse_name`, `suffix`, `time_zone`,`website`, `tag_ids`)

patch.description: Updates a contact with only the values provided in the request.

parameters.name: update_mask
parameters.description: An optional list of properties to be updated. If set, only the provided properties will be updated and others will be skipped.

get.description: Get the custom fields and optional properties for the Contact object

group_id.description: An optional tab group to place the field under in the interface.  If not specified, will default to the 'Custom Fields' tab.

user_group_id.description: An optional user group to choose from when selecting values for User or UserListBox fields.

title.description: A value for either "title" or "type" is required.

type.description: A value for either "title" or "type" is required. The value may be one of "Appointment", "Call", "Email", "Fax", "Letter" or "Other" in Keap Max/Pro, or an admin-configured value in Classic.

remind_time_mins.description: Value in minutes before start_date to show pop-up reminder.  Acceptable values are [5,10,15,30,60,120,240,480,1440,2880]
Value in minutes before start_date to show pop-up reminder.  Acceptable values are [5,10,15,30,60,120,240,480,1440,2880]

countries.description: A key-value pair of country code and country name.

provinces.description: A key-value pair of province code and province name.

optional_properties.description: These fields are not transmitted by default on this model, but can be requested by specifying them in a comma-separated list in the optional_properties query parameter.

create_time.description: On initial object the returned value for this property may not accurately represent the exact stored value.

title.description: A value for either "title" or "type" is required.

type.description: A value for either "title" or "type" is required. The value may be one of "Appointment", "Call", "Email", "Fax", "Letter" or "Other" in Keap Max/Pro, or an admin-configured value in Classic.

create_time.description: On initial object the returned value for this property may not accurately represent the exact stored value.
